snippet: A woman claiming to have lived with a senior member of the cult behind the 1995 nerve gas attack on Tokyo’s subways turned herself in and was arrested Tuesday for helping him evade the police.
abstract: Woman claiming to have lived with a senior member of Aum Shinrikyo, the cult behind the 1995 nerve gas attack on Tokyo’s subways, turns herself in and and is arrested for helping him evade the police.
lead_paragraph: A woman claiming to have lived with a senior member of the cult behind the 1995 nerve gas attack on Tokyo’s subways turned herself in and was arrested Tuesday for helping him evade the police.
